quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Skadoosh!
author: Po

quote: You have to believe in yourself. That’s the secret.
author: Po

quote: The strongest of us sometimes have the hardest time fighting what’s on the inside.
author: Po

quote: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Let’s not forget what happened to the man who suddenly got everything he wanted.
author: Po

quote: The true hero is flawed.
author: Po

quote: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: It’s all an illusion, Tai Lung.
author: Shifu

quote: Tai Lung is a monster of vengeance.
author: Shifu

quote: You’re just a poor, sick, misguided dragon. That’s all you are.
author: Po

quote: You’re just a prisoner of your own anger, man.
author: Po

quote: There is no charge for awesome.
author: Po

quote: I don’t just want to survive, I want to live.
author: Po

quote: The only true limit is the one you set for yourself.
author: Shifu

quote: The key to martial arts is not just about victory or defeat but about inner growth.
author: Shifu

quote: There is no secret ingredient. It’s just you.
author: Shifu

quote: If you only do what you can do, you’ll never be better than what you are.
author: Shifu

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: There is no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
author: Shifu

quote: The measure of a real champion is not whether they can triumph, but whether they can overcome defeat.
author: Shifu

quote: Fear makes you powerless.
author: Tai Lung

quote: A true warrior fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him.
author: Shifu

quote: It’s not the size of the wand that matters, it’s the magic in the stick.
author: Po

quote: The right path is not always the easiest one.
author: Shifu

quote: Your story may not have such a happy beginning, but that doesn’t make you who you are; it is the rest of your story that will define who you are.
author: Shifu

quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
author: Shifu

quote: Your mind is like this water, my friend. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.
author: Oogway

quote: When we feel fear, it is because we are unsure. And when we are unsure, we must look within.
author: Shifu
